name: strong
features: Delivery: FAST & FREE Shipping on All Orders
Premier Short Inseam : Designed to be worn just below the knee for a classic, high-performance baseball look
Double Knit Fabric : Lightweight yet durable construction built to withstand the demands of elite play
Tunnel-Belt Loop Waist : Traditional belt loop design for a secure and adjustable fit
Two-Snap Fly Closure : Extended fly front with two snaps offers a snug and reliable closure
Set-In Back Pockets : Functional pockets with button closures provide convenient storage
Elastic Bottom : Keeps the pant securely in place just below the knee
Embroidered Logo : Premium stitched Mizuno branding for a professional finish
